summary: A mod which replaces the default bear noises with singing versions!
descriptionHtml:
Snoopey\'s Singing Autotune Bears (Skyrim)


I always thought bears could do with a bit more singing.
Check out the mod in this demonstation video http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XXW45nkPTZA

Installation
Extract and move the data folder to your skyrim folder - click \"yes to overwrite\" if necessary.

Unstallation
Just delete the bear folder in \"skyrim\\Data\\sound\\fx\\npc\".

All credit goes to Snoopey
author: Snoopey
